circumstances: While taking off by night from Salisbury Airport, one of the engine lost power. The pilot lost control of the airplane that crashed by the runway. A passenger was killed while four other occupants were injured. The aircraft was destroyed.
probable_cause:
Engine malfunction for undetermined reason. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Failed to follow approved procedures,
- Failed to obtain/maintain flying speed,
- Inadequate preflight preparation, 
- Improperly loaded aircraft,
- Did not use fuel boost pumps for takeoff, 
- Aircraft about 400 lbs over gross weight.
